name: Product Launches & Announcements
description: Highlights major product releases and announcements so go-to-market teams stay aligned.
positive_samples: We're excited to announce the launch of our new product
Today we're releasing version 2.0 with major improvements
We've just launched a groundbreaking new feature
Official announcement: our product is now available
Big news! We're unveiling our new platform
Product release: now live and ready for users
